#   DuckDuckBot is the web crawler used by DuckDuckGo to index sites
#   for its search results. It continuously scans websites via web
#   crawling to collect content for search engine listings.
#   
#   Web crawlers, or spiders, are automated bots run by search engines
#   like DuckDuckGo, Google, and Bing. Their goal is to index website
#   content so it can appear in search results.
#   
#   DuckDuckBot identifies itself with the user agent:
#       DuckDuckBot/1.1; (+http://duckduckgo.com/duckduckbot.html)
#   
#   Use this IP list if you want to prevent DuckDuckGo from crawling
#   your server.
